TunableList.name: LOCATOR_COLORS
TunableList.description: Debug Locator Color mapping. This way we can map locator types to colors. When the user types the |debugvis.locators.start command, they will be able to see which locator belongs to it's appropriate color, even if the catalog side changes.

TunableEnum.name: Locator Color
TunableEnum.description: The debug Color this Locator will appear in the world.

Tunable.name: Locator ID
Tunable.description: The ID of the Locator from the Catalog under Locators.
